name: War Of Gold
storyline:
Enemy military forces have stolen gold bars. You are super soldier who is only hope to save missing gold. 10 different locations where gold are hidden. You need use different weapons to survive and killing enemies. Game contains also lot of vehicles. Some levels player can use sport car to move faster. Levels contains also powerful but slow tank which have 2 weapons. With tank you can destroy human enemies and also enemy forces tanks. Few levels also include fast plane plane. You need use fighter to flying and destroying several enemy fighters and finding hidden golden bars. Plane also contain parachute so you can jump from plane if situation needed. Game contain also training area where basic gameplay objects and controls can be trained. Different maps super soldier can collect different weapons like knifes, rifle, grenade launcher,pistol, sniper, grenades etc.
But only one bigger gun can be carried on so you need decide which gun is best for different situation.

So be the hero and find stolen gold back!!!
summary: You super hero soldier need save robber gold bars back in this epic battle. Find stolen gold at different levels and beware dangerous enemies
